item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are bullish on these 3 stocks for the long term
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks, including Snowflake and Advanced Micro Devices, favored by Wall Street.

item.title: Activist Irenic takes a stake in Atkore, urges company to consider a sale
item.description: Irenic's stake comes at a critical inflection point for Atkore. It needs a CEO, has operational and capital challenges, and a poor market perception.
